title: Cape, second half 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallics, sequins
Technique: embroidery with chenille and metal thread on moire
description: Small cape for an ecclesiatic figure, the "Bambino". White silk moire embroidered with silk chenille in greens, purples, rose, and gold sequins and gold and silver thread. Design of grapevine, rose and grain aroudn border. Lined with blue silk with white brocaded floral design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cape, second half 18th century.Medium: silk, metallics, sequins
Technique: embroidery with chenille and metal thread on moire. 1899-2-7.
